name: Tohil Candle Holder
description: With prominent, clean lines and a simple yet great elegance, the Tohil Candle Holder, modernizes any candlestick. Offering a perfect balance of sculpture and graceful silhouettes in black patina bronze, this new creation will stand out in a room as it is placed in the center of a table or on a console. The Tohil is as beautiful on its own as it is in pairs.
